Text: Re REVISED Merged Leg Document Cc Note that I havent passed these by Annie but I believe shed agree with the suggestions Gary I dont find any reference to this new definition being used in the language If that is the intent then I believe that we need to strike this definition New Large Customer is a Large Customer which either has not taken electric service from an electrical corporation in California prior to the effective date of this bill or has been taking Direct Access service continuously since April At the start of Section I believe the should be On or before July the CPUC shall approve electrical corporation tariffs describing Core Service Term Service and Spot Market Service to be available to customers beginning at the Transition Date Not my issue but I recall that it was agreed to keep the following one thing from Jeffs efforts yesterday The provision of Water Code Section requiring the commission to suspend the right of customers to engage in direct access and take electric service from an alternate provider is hereby repealed

Re REVISED Merged Leg Document Cc Note that I havent passed these by Annie but I believe shed agree with the suggestions Gary I dont find any reference to this new definition being used in the language If that is the intent then I believe that we need to strike this definition New Large Customer is a Large Customer which either has not taken electric service from an electrical corporation in California prior to the effective date of this bill or has been taking Direct Access service continuously since April At the start of Section I believe the should be On or before July the CPUC shall approve electrical corporation tariffs describing Core Service Term Service and Spot Market Service to be available to customers beginning at the Transition Date Not my issue but I recall that it was agreed to keep the following one thing from Jeffs efforts yesterday The provision of Water Code Section requiring the commission to suspend the right of customers to engage in direct access and take electric service from an alternate provider is hereby repealed
